name: Endless Runner-GMTK Game Jam
description:
The theme is out of control. So i made that you only can hit Jump(Space) and the game is endless and keep your audio low. Plz sub to me also: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjYyhvj8WZZw5OHzyULhdng?sub_confirmation=1 And also see the read me file and see the read me file and see the instructions to play to . the info written is: 
Extract  and open read me file and then play with Endless runner.exe
if it is not loading

alt-f4 to quit the application.

RETRY BUTTON MIGHT BE SLIGHTLY OFF THE SCREEN JUST HIT BLUE BUTTON  IF IT IS NOT VISIBLE   see devlog - https://youtu.be/nOSDCBKCGe0
